commands.name: az iot du device deployment cancel
commands.summary: Cancel a device class subgroup deployment.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device deployment cancel --account
                                   --cid
                                   --deployment-id
                                   --gid
                                   --instance
                                   [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device deployment cancel -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id}

commands.name: az iot du device deployment create
commands.summary: Create a deployment for a device group. The deployment will be multi-cast against every device class subgroup within the target group.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device deployment create --account
                                   --deployment-id
                                   --gid
                                   --instance
                                   --un
                                   --up
                                   --update-version
                                   [--failed-count]
                                   [--failed-percentage]
                                   [--rbun]
                                   [--rbup]
                                   [--rbuv]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--start-time]
examples: az iot du device deployment create -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --update-name {update_name} --update-provider {update_provider} --update-version {update_version}

az iot du device deployment create -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --update-name {update_name} --update-provider {update_provider} --update-version {update_version} --start-time "2022-12-20T01:00:00"

az iot du device deployment create -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --update-name {update_name} --update-provider {update_provider} --update-version {update_version} --failed-count 10 --failed-percentage 5 --rollback-update-name {rollback_update_name} --rollback-update-provider {rollback_update_provider} --rollback-update-version {rollback_update_version}

commands.name: az iot du device deployment delete
commands.summary: Delete a deployment by device group or device class subgroup.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device deployment delete --account
                                   --deployment-id
                                   --gid
                                   --instance
                                   [--cid]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--yes {false, true}]
examples: az iot du device deployment delete -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --group-id {device_group_id}
az iot du device deployment delete -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id}

commands.name: az iot du device deployment list
commands.summary: List deployments for a device group or device class subgroup.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device deployment list --account
                                 --gid
                                 --instance
                                 [--cid]
                                 [--order-by]
                                 [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device deployment list -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id}
az iot du device deployment list -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --order-by "startDateTime desc"
az iot du device deployment list -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id}

commands.name: az iot du device deployment list-devices
commands.summary: List devices in a device class subgroup deployment along with their state. Useful for getting a list of failed devices.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device deployment list-devices --account
                                         --cid
                                         --deployment-id
                                         --gid
                                         --instance
                                         [--filter]
                                         [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device deployment list-devices -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id}

az iot du device deployment list-devices -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --filter "deviceId eq 'd0' and deviceState eq 'InProgress'"

commands.name: az iot du device deployment retry
commands.summary: Retry a device class subgroup deployment.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device deployment retry --account
                                  --cid
                                  --deployment-id
                                  --gid
                                  --instance
                                  [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device deployment retry -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id}

commands.name: az iot du device deployment show
commands.summary: Show a deployment for a device group or device class subgroup including status which details a breakdown of how many devices in the deployment are in progress, completed, or failed.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device deployment show --account
                                 --deployment-id
                                 --gid
                                 --instance
                                 [--cid]
                                 [--resource-group]
                                 [--status {false, true}]
examples: az iot du device deployment show -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id}
az iot du device deployment show -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --status
az iot du device deployment show -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id}
az iot du device deployment show -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --group-id {device_group_id} --class-id {device_class_id} --deployment-id {deployment_id} --status
